ygData.subject: Why there is only 1 thread active?
ygData.msgSnippet: Hi, i use Heritrix 1.14 and BdbFrontier, i find if the classKey of CrawlURI is the same(IP), there would be only 1 thread active, no matter how many

Hi, i use Heritrix 1.14 and BdbFrontier, i find if the classKey of CrawlURI=
 is the same(IP), there would be only 1 thread active, no matter how many m=
ax-toethread i specified. it seems one thread crawls several URLs, and then=
 the next one.

so how to active more thread with BdbFrontier, i changed th=
e classKey of the CrawlURI, to increase the workqueue, but it would cause o=
ther problem, which terminate the crawling.

please, thanks for any suggest=
ion
